summary: This document is a collection of payroll authorization forms and related memoranda for Leodis C. Matthews, an employee of the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA), detailing his appointment, salary adjustments, and payroll certification.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents, dated from 1977 to 1979, pertains to the employment of Leodis C. Matthews by the HSCA. It includes payroll authorization forms indicating his appointment as Staff Counsel, salary adjustments to $30,000 and later $31,700, and a termination notice. Additionally, there are memoranda regarding his hiring and payroll certification requirements, including a statement on relationships to members of Congress, along with the reason for postponement of information.
